add_objects.name: PRODUCTS
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM PRODUCTS P WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_CODE_INPUT');

add_objects.name: MODULES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT M.MODULE_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM MODULES M WHERE UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_CODE_INPUT');

add_objects.name: PRODUCT_MODULES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID)>=1  THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM PRODUCT_MODULES PM WHERE UPPER(PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) in (SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID FROM PRODUCTS P WHERE P.PRODUCT_CODE=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT')) AND UPPER(PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) in (SELECT DISTINCT M.MODULE_SYS_ID FROM MODULES M WHERE UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT'));
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_MODULES(PRODUCT_SYS_ID,MODULE_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY) SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID,M.MODULE_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT' FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN MODULES M ON (1=1) WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: CUSTOMERS
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM CUSTOMERS C WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_CODE_INPUT');

add_objects.name: CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP WHERE CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID FROM CUSTOMERS C WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT')) AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID FROM PRODUCTS P WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT'));
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS(CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,PRODUCT_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY) SELECT C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT' FROM CUSTOMERS C JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (1=1) WHERE P.PRODUCT_CODE='PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT' AND C.CUSTOMER_CODE='CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT';

add_objects.name: CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID = CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('CUST_PROD_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND PM.MODULE_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MODULE_SYS_ID FROM MODULES M WHERE UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('PROD_MOD_SYS_ID_INPUT'))) AND CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID FROM CUSTOMERS C JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON(C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID FROM PRODUCTS P WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('CUST_PROD_SYS_ID_INPUT')));
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES(CUST_PROD_SYS_ID,PROD_MOD_SYS_ID,CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,`DEFAULT`,MODULE_URL,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY) SELECT CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID,PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID,C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,DEF.DEFAULT_COL_VALUE,MODULE_URL_INPUT,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT'  FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP JOIN PRODUCTS P ON(P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON (M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>=1 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS DEFAULT_COL_VALUE FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID FROM CUSTOMERS C JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON(C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID FROM PRODUCTS P WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('CUST_PROD_SYS_ID_INPUT'))) AND CPM.`DEFAULT`=TRUE)DEF ON (1=1) WHERE UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('CUST_PROD_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('PROD_MOD_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_FEATURE_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES CPMF JOIN  CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM ON (CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON (M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON (CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID AND CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CPMF.FEATURE_CODE)=UPPER('FEATURE_CODE_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES(CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID,FEATURE_NAME,FEATURE_CODE,FEATURE_DESC,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,DEFAULT_URL,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY,`DEFAULT`) SELECT DISTINCT CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID,'FEATURE_NAME_INPUT','FEATURE_CODE_INPUT','FEATURE_DESC_INPUT',ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,'DEFAULT_URL_INPUT',CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT',DEF.DEFAULT_COL_VALUE FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON(M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON(CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID AND CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>=1 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS DEFAULT_COL_VALUE FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES CPMF JOIN  CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM ON (CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON (M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON (CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID AND CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT')AND CPMF.`DEFAULT`=TRUE)DEF ON (1=1) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: ROLES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT R.ROLE_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM ROLES R JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=R.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(R.ROLE_CODE)=UPPER('ROLE_CODE_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO ROLES(CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,ROLE_NAME,ROLE_CODE,ROLE_DESC,ROLE_TYPE,DATA_SECURITY_KEY,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY)SELECT C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID ,'ROLE_NAME_INPUT','ROLE_CODE_INPUT','ROLE_DESC_INPUT','ROLE_TYPE_INPUT','DATA_SECURITY_KEY_INPUT',ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT' FROM CUSTOMERS C WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: PRIVILEGES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT PRV.PRIVILEGE_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM PRIVILEGES PRV JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES CPMF ON(CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_FEATURE_SYS_ID=PRV.CUST_PROD_MOD_FEATURE_SYS_ID) JOIN  CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM ON (CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON (M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON (CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID AND CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CPMF.FEATURE_CODE)=UPPER('FEATURE_CODE_INPUT') AND UPPER(CPMF.FEATURE_CODE)=UPPER('FRN_5') AND UPPER(PRV.PRIVILEGE_CODE)=UPPER('DASH3RW');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO PRIVILEGES(CUST_PROD_MOD_FEATURE_SYS_ID,PRIVILEGE_CODE,PRIVILEGE_NAME,PRIVILEGE_DESC,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY) SELECT DISTINCT CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_FEATURE_SYS_ID,'PRIVILEGE_CODE_INPUT','PRIVILEGE_NAME_INPUT','PRIVILEGE_DESC_INPUT',ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT' FROM CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULE_FEATURES CPMF JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_MODULES CPM ON(CPMF.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CPM.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCT_MODULES PM ON (PM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID=CPM.PROD_MOD_SYS_ID) JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=PM.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) JOIN MODULES M ON(M.MODULE_SYS_ID=PM.MODULE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMER_PRODUCTS CP ON(CP.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID=CPM.CUST_PROD_SYS_ID AND CP.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID AND CP.PRODUCT_SYS_ID=P.PRODUCT_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRODUCT_CODE)=UPPER('PRODUCT_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(M.MODULE_CODE)=UPPER('MODULE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CPMF.FEATURE_CODE)=UPPER('FEATURE_CODE_INPUT');

add_objects.name: ROLE_PRIVILEGES
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT RP.ROLE_PRIVILEGES_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM ROLE_PRIVILEGES RP JOIN PRIVILEGES P ON(P.PRIVILEGE_SYS_ID=RP.PRIVILEGE_SYS_ID) JOIN ROLES R ON(R.ROLE_SYS_ID=RP.ROLE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON ( C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=R.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(R.ROLE_CODE)=UPPER('ROLE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRIVILEGE_CODE)=UPPER('PRIVILEGE_SYS_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO ROLE_PRIVILEGES(ROLE_SYS_ID,PRIVILEGE_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY) SELECT R.ROLE_SYS_ID,P.PRIVILEGE_SYS_ID,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT' FROM ROLES R JOIN PRIVILEGES P ON (1=1) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON ( C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=R.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(R.ROLE_CODE)=UPPER('ROLE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(P.PRIVILEGE_CODE)=UPPER('PRIVILEGE_SYS_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: USERS
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT U.USER_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM USERS U JOIN ROLES R ON (R.ROLE_SYS_ID=U.ROLE_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON(C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=R.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(R.ROLE_CODE)=UPPER('ROLE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(U.USER_ID)=UPPER('USER_ID_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO USERS(USER_ID,CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,ROLE_SYS_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD,ACTIVE_STATUS_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY,PWD_MODIFIED_DATE) SELECT 'USER_ID_INPUT',C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,R.ROLE_SYS_ID,'FIRST_NAME_INPUT','LAST_NAME_INPUT','ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_INPUT',ACTIVE_STATUS_IND_INPUT,CREATED_DATE_INPUT,'CREATED_BY_INPUT',PWD_MODIFIED_DATE_INPUT FROM ROLES R JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON(C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=R.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(R.ROLE_CODE)=UPPER('ROLE_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: CONTACT_INFO
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CI.CONTACT_INFO_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM CONTACT_INFO CI JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CI.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CI.EMAIL)=UPPER('EMAIL_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO CONTACT_INFO(CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,SOURCE_SYS_ID,SOURCE_SYS_ID_TYPE,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,EMAIL) SELECT C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID,'SOURCE_SYS_ID_INPUT','SOURCE_SYS_ID_TYPE_INPUT','FIRST_NAME_INPUT','LAST_NAME_INPUT','EMAIL_INPUT' FROM CUSTOMERS C WHERE UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE) = UPPER('CUSTOMER_SYS_ID_INPUT');

add_objects.name: USER_CONTACT
add_objects.validation_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT UC.USER_CONTACT_SYS_ID)>=1 THEN 'FAILURE' ELSE 'SUCCESS' END AS RESULT_CNT FROM USER_CONTACT UC JOIN USERS U ON (U.USER_SYS_ID=UC.USER_SYS_ID) JOIN CONTACT_INFO CI ON (CI.CONTACT_INFO_SYS_ID=UC.CONTACT_INFO_SYS_ID) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (CI.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(U.USER_ID)=UPPER('USER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CI.EMAIL)=UPPER('EMAIL_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_CODE_INPUT');
add_objects.insert_query: INSERT INTO USER_CONTACT(USER_SYS_ID,CONTACT_INFO_SYS_ID) SELECT U.USER_SYS_ID,CI.CONTACT_INFO_SYS_ID FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACT_INFO CI ON (1=1) JOIN CUSTOMERS C ON (C.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID=CI.CUSTOMER_SYS_ID) WHERE UPPER(U.USER_ID)=UPPER('USER_SYS_ID_INPUT') AND UPPER(CI.EMAIL)=UPPER('EMAIL_INPUT') AND UPPER(C.CUSTOMER_CODE)=UPPER('CUSTOMER_CODE_INPUT')
